verbose_text: Similarly, in postnatal day 7 (P7) rats, an age when brain development is comparable to the late preterm human infant, immediate induction of hypothermia after HI reduced caspase-3 expression in the core area of cortical infarction but not in the penumbra, suggesting that hypothermia modulated both caspase dependent and independent mechanisms.
